color_picking_instruction_1: Click anywhere on the screen to pick a color
onboarding_instruction_1: Click the top-right button to enter color picking mode
api_key_note: Enter the API key obtained from the service provider. The key will only be stored locally on your device. Please keep it secure.
model_description: The list is roughly sorted by the number of parameters from low to high. Generally, smaller models respond faster and are more economical, while larger models generate more vivid outputs.
language_note: Some settings will take effect after restarting the app.
color_pick_shortcut_description: Shortcut must include Alt, Cmd/Ctrl, or Shift keys. Press Backspace to clear.
color_pick_shortcut_alert: The shortcut is already in use by the system. Please choose another.
error_model_invalid: Please select a language model in the settings menu at the bottom right.
error_api_key_invalid: Please enter a valid language model API key in the settings menu at the bottom right.
error_no_response: API did not respond. Check your settings or network connection.
error_unhandled_error: An unknown error occurred. Please check your settings and try again.
open_source_statement: ColorLift is an open-source app licensed under GPL-3.0-only.
disclaimer_statement: This tool is not intended for precise color measurement or professional guidance. All color descriptions and recommendations are AI-generated. Please verify critical information.
update_available_dialog_message: A new version ({{latestVersion}}) is available. Download via browser?
no_update_dialog_message: You are using the latest version.
